alert.note: Alert for Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 4:17PM CDT until July 17 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WEBSTER AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 416 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fordland, or 11 miles southeast of Strafford, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Springfield, Rogersville, Fordland and Turners. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
